parts.1:
Package: wnpp
Severity: wishlist
Owner: Sruthi Chandran <srud@disroot.org>
X-Debbugs-CC: debian-devel@lists.debian.org

* Package name    : node-streamtest
  Version         : 1.2.2
  Upstream Author : Nicolas Froidure
* URL             : https://github.com/nfroidure/streamtest
* License         : Expat
  Programming Lang: JavaScript
  Description     : set of utils to test your stream based modules
accross various stream implementations of NodeJS

result.body:
Package: wnpp
Severity: wishlist
Owner: Sruthi Chandran 
X-Debbugs-CC: debian-devel@lists.debian.org

* Package name    : node-streamtest
  Version         : 1.2.2
  Upstream Author : Nicolas Froidure
* URL             : https://github.com/nfroidure/streamtest
* License         : Expat
  Programming Lang: JavaScript
  Description     : set of utils to test your stream based modules
accross various stream implementations of NodeJS
